<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hunter's Fangs](/Feats.aspx?ID=2769) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Anadi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=255" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 104 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your fangs are exceptionally painful. Whenever you score a critical hit with your fangs unarmed attack, you apply the [unarmed attack's](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=4) critical specialization effect.
name: Hunter's Fangs
